title: ImageCrop
name: ImageCrop
description: Crops a image to a specified rectangular area.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

arguments.name: x
arguments.description: The X origin of the crop area.

arguments.name: y
arguments.description: The Y origin of the crop area.

arguments.name: width
arguments.description: The width of the crop area.

arguments.name: height
arguments.description: The height of the crop area.
